ingredients.item: 3 tbsp extra virgin olive oil, plus extra to drizzle
1 slice day-old white bread, crusts removed
1 large cucumber, deseeded and roughly chopped
1 green pepper, deseeded and roughly chopped
1 green chilli, deseeded and ﬁnely chopped

instructions.step: Tip all of the ingredients into a food processor or liquidiser and blend until smooth. Season to taste and blitz again - if the soup is a bit too thick, add a splash of ice-cold water. Transfer to the fridge to chill for 1-2 hours (the soup may separate slightly during this time — if so, just give it a quick stir before serving).
Serve the chilled soup in cups, drizzled with a little extra virgin olive oil and garnished with sliced salad onions, if you wish.
